docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the procedure of a heart bypass surgery.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the procedure of a heart bypass surgery.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the glands of the endocrine system, specifically enlarging the pituitary gland, thyroid gland, parathyroid glands, thymus, adrenal glands, and pancreas. A communication path within the neuroendocrine system is also shown.
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the glands of the endocrine system, specifically enlarging the pituitary gland, thyroid gland, parathyroid glands, thymus, adrenal glands, and pancreas. A communication path within the neuroendocrine system is also shown.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the neurological control of normal bladder function.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the neurological control of normal bladder function.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the process of macular degeneration in the eye.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the process of macular degeneration in the eye.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the various structures of the eye and how the shape of the eye affects vision (nearsightedness and farsightedness.
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the various structures of the eye and how the shape of the eye affects vision (nearsightedness and farsightedness.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the formation of a bunion.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the formation of a bunion.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows uric acid crystals moving to the big toe joint causing pain.
docs.snippet: This animation shows uric acid crystals moving to the big toe joint causing pain.

docs.lead_paragraph: Through a series of magnifications of the ear, this animation depicts the movement, amplification, translation, and interpretation of sound waves traveling through the ear’s three regions, ultimately becoming neural messages sent to the brain.
docs.snippet: Through a series of magnifications of the ear, this animation depicts the movement, amplification, translation, and interpretation of sound waves traveling through the ear’s three regions, ultimately becoming neural messages sent to the brain.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the cardiac conduction system and the arrhythmias of a fast and slow beating heart.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the cardiac conduction system and the arrhythmias of a fast and slow beating heart.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the cardiac conduction system, a group of specialized muscle cells that signal the rest of the heart to contract. An ECG tracing is shown in tandem with a normal heart beat.
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the cardiac conduction system, a group of specialized muscle cells that signal the rest of the heart to contract. An ECG tracing is shown in tandem with a normal heart beat.
